content.text: I love video games! What's your favorite?
I like to play games that are relaxing and easy to pick up and play, like Animal Crossing.
I love Animal Crossing! I also like to play photography games.
I would love to get into photography, but I don't have a good camera.
I have a great camera! I can let you borrow it sometime if you want.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my friends and family, and I love to cook.
Me too! I love to cook and bake. I'm actually really good at it.
That's awesome! I'm not very good at cooking, but I love to eat!
We should get together sometime and cook dinner! I'll make my famous lasagna.
